      • asciiDigitLookup

        public static int asciiDigitLookup(int asciiCode)
        Lookup and return the numeric digit an asciiCode represents as an int. Throw an IllegalArgumentException if the asciiCode input does not represent a numeric digit.
        Parameters:
        asciiCode - Primitive int representing the ASCII code to look up.
        Returns:
        The digit the asciiCode input represents as an integer.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the asciiCode input does not represent a numeric digit (code outside of range [48-57])

      • add

        public UnboundedInt add(UnboundedInt u)
        Add this UnboundedInt with another UnboundedInt. Return a new UnboundedInt with the sum.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • trim

        public void trim()
        Trim zero nodes starting at the tail node and traversing backwards. This removes left-padded (extraneous) zeros, i.e. 000470 -> 470
        Parameters:
        none -

      • seek

        public void seek(int n)
        Seek to a particular node within the linked list. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if not that many nodes are present.
        Parameters:
        int - The position to seek to. The head node is position 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when a nonexistent position argument is given.

      • multiply

        public UnboundedInt multiply(UnboundedInt u)
        Multiply this UnboundedInt object with another UnboundedInt. Return a new UnboundedInt with the product.
        Parameters:
        UnboundedInt - The UnboundedInt to multiply by.
        Returns:
        UnboundedInt Product of the multiply operation.
